title: Social media posts mislead people with fake mobile numbers to buy fuel: Lanka IOC MD
body_lines: The Sri Lanka IOC today denied social media posts about district inquiry numbers on where to get fuel across the country.
While issuing a statement, Lanka IOC Managing Director Manoj Gupta categorically denied messages in circulation over social media.
He claimed that in some sections of the fake post he had seen the city-wise mobile numbers where the customers needed to contact for their fuel requirements are described.
Meanwhile, he said there was no decision to increase the price of LIOC fuel. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
